name: Death, Taxes, and Bananas
description:
Grandma Betty is a small banana stand owner. For the past 50 years, she's been exchanging her bananas in return for a nice wad of cash. However, the Tax Agency recently got tipped that she hasn't been reporting this income...

You play as Betty, and you must protect your Banana stand at all costs against the all consuming Tax Agency. Serve your customers quickly to accumulate as much wealth as possible, and use this wealth to buy weapons from your back wall to fend off the Tax Agents. 

Features:

  • Serving Bananas to NPCs
  • Collecting large wads of cash
  • Unlocking 3 unique weapons
  • Fighting Gladiator style battles against Tax Agents

Controls:

  • wasd to move around
  • 'e' to interact
  • Left Click and Right Click to shoot
  • Space to jump
